languages.text: {n}Клеменциа отличается от большинства дворян — не только костюмом, но и манерой держать себя. Впрочем, судя по видным на открытых участках кожи шрамам, хотя бы отчасти ее обучение проходило в боях, а не защищенном лектории.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Клеменциа отличается от большинства дворян — не только костюмом, но и манерой держать себя. Впрочем, судя по видным на открытых участках кожи шрамам, хотя бы отчасти ее обучение проходило в боях, а не защищенном лектории.{n}

languages.text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа отличается от большинства дворян — не только костюмом, но и манерой держать себя. Впрочем, судя по видным на открытых участках кожи шрамам, хотя бы отчасти ее обучение проходило в боях, а не защищенном лектории.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place in battles rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

{n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place in battles rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

{n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

{n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

{n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅与绝大多数贵族并不相同，这并不仅仅体现在她的穿着，更体现在她的举止。不过，从她皮肤上的伤痕看得出来，她的教育并非完全在安全的学院之内进行的，还有很大一部分是在战场上进行的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅与绝大多数贵族并不相同，这并不仅仅体现在她的穿着，更体现在她的举止。不过，从她皮肤上的伤痕看得出来，她的教育并非完全在安全的学院之内进行的，还有很大一部分是在战场上进行的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Clementia es diferente a los otros nobles, no solo en su indumentaria sino también en su porte. A juzgar por las cicatrices de su piel, al menos parte de su educación tuvo lugar en el campo de batalla y no en la seguridad de un liceo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia es diferente a los otros nobles, no solo en su indumentaria sino también en su porte. A juzgar por las cicatrices de su piel, al menos parte de su educación tuvo lugar en el campo de batalla y no en la seguridad de un liceo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアは多くの貴族とは異なっていた。身なりだけでなく、立ち居振る舞いもかなり違う。とはいえ、彼女の皮膚に残された痣から察するに、どちらかというと安全な学校ではなく戦場で教育を受けたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアは多くの貴族とは異なっていた。身なりだけでなく、立ち居振る舞いもかなり違う。とはいえ、彼女の皮膚に残された痣から察するに、どちらかというと安全な学校ではなく戦場で教育を受けたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Clementia unterscheidet sich von den meisten anderen Adligen – nicht nur durch ihre Kleidung, sondern auch durch ihr Verhalten. Zumal die sichtbaren Narben auf ihrer Haut nahelegen, dass zumindest ein Teil ihrer Erziehung auf einem Schlachtfeld stattgefunden hat und nicht innerhalb der sicheren Mauern einer höheren Schule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia unterscheidet sich von den meisten anderen Adligen – nicht nur durch ihre Kleidung, sondern auch durch ihr Verhalten. Zumal die sichtbaren Narben auf ihrer Haut nahelegen, dass zumindest ein Teil ihrer Erziehung auf einem Schlachtfeld stattgefunden hat und nicht innerhalb der sicheren Mauern einer höheren Schule.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Clémentia est différente des autres nobles, non seulement dans la manière dont elle s'habille, mais également dans la façon dont elle se tient. À en juger par les cicatrices visibles sur sa peau, elle a reçu une partie de son éducation sur un champ de bataille plutôt que dans l'enceinte rassurante d'un lyceum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia est différente des autres nobles, non seulement dans la manière dont elle s'habille, mais également dans la façon dont elle se tient. À en juger par les cicatrices visibles sur sa peau, elle a reçu une partie de son éducation sur un champ de bataille plutôt que dans l'enceinte rassurante d'un lyceum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Clementia, çoğu soyludan farklı... Sırf giyinişiyle değil, duruşuyla da. Gerçi vücudunda görülen yara izleri; Clementia'nın eğitimi kısmen de olsa sınıflarda değil, savaş meydanlarında yaşanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is different from most nobles — not just in the way she's dressed, but in her bearing too. Although, judging by the scars visible on her skin, at least some part of her education took place on a battlefield, rather than within the secure confines of a lyceum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia, çoğu soyludan farklı... Sırf giyinişiyle değil, duruşuyla da. Gerçi vücudunda görülen yara izlerine bakılacak olursa, Clementia'nın eğitimi kısmen de olsa eğitim salonlarında değil, savaş meydanlarında yaşanmış.{/n}
